name: Combine Kitchen
description:
Combine Kitchen is a game where, you can combine ingredients in a bowl according to the recipe.  See your lowest times in the leaderboard.

Instructions

To make food you have to click on the play button and select your recipe. To view the recipes, click the cookbook next to the fridge. You can open  the cupboard and the kitchen.

Notes

BUG: Whenever you put the spaghetti in the pot, the game slows down.

For the chicken strips you have to put them in the pot

The meatballs have to be warmed up in the microwave

Any ingredient that touches the bowl will be put in it. You have to slice, cook, microwave the ingredients before putting them in the bowl.
